definitions.definition: A doctrine held by a member of a religion at variance or conflict with established religious beliefs .
A controversial or unorthodox opinion held by a member of a group, as in politics , philosophy or science .

main_definition: ( religion ) A doctrine held by a member of a religion at variance or conflict with established religious beliefs .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A controversial or unorthodox opinion held by a member of a group, as in politics , philosophy or science .
